vsParam:
It seems the dragon still lives in Ateria
as we got the most damage reports from there.

OK, you go to Ateria!
And you protect the Academy, understood!?
Yes! Let's set off right away!

Ribrum placed a commission of medicine synthesis.
The whole Alchemy, please start to make it right now!

Yes!
Hey, let's gather ingredients first. Go!

Bring all the wounded here!
I'll heal them with recovery magic!

I guess the dragon has been causing more damage.
Even all the relicology students have been sent to kill monsters.

The disaster has been so urgent now.
It will only get worse if it goes on like this...

Without addressing the root cause, we'll be overwhelmed by
more and more monsters pouring in.

Hey, why are you in a trance, [px]?
Hurry up and make items!

We'll kill the monsters.
Please focus on synthesizing items.

Yeah, with Sterk and Mimi being here,
we can take any monster down!

Yeah, just count on me.
I'll keep you safe.
Well... I swear on my honor as a knight that I will never fail you.

I think... you know how powerful I am, don't you?
You have got to succeed, or I'll kick your ass!

Everyone in the Academy, and Sterk and Mimi,
are all trying their best...

Heehee...
In this battle against the dragon, we're not alone!
[px]... Anyway, we have to make a trump card item!
